text: When <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>14</mn></msup></math> electrons are removed from a neutral metal sphere, the charge on the sphere becomes:
hint: As we know that, q = ne = <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>14</mn></msup></math>× 1.6 × <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>-19</mn></msup></math> [F05C] q = 1.6 × <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>-5</mn></msup></math>C = 16 μC Electrons are removed, so charge will be positive.
